activityLevels.veryActive: Very Active (Hard exercise daily & physical job)

fitnessCalc.validationError: Please check your input values: Age (10-120), Height (100-250cm), Weight (30-300kg), Body Fat (3-60% or empty)

results.title: Results
results.bmiDesc: Evaluates if your weight is in a healthy range

bmiDescriptions.underweight: Body weight is lower than healthy range
bmiDescriptions.normal: Body weight is in healthy range
bmiDescriptions.overweight: Body weight is higher than healthy range

results.bmrTdeeDesc: Basal Metabolic Rate and Total Daily Energy Expenditure
results.noFfmiDesc: Please enter body fat percentage above to see FFMI data.
results.ffmiInfo: FFMI requires body fat percentage. Men 17-22 is normal, >25 is excellent. Women 14-19 is normal, >21 is excellent.
results.idealWeightDesc: Healthy weight range based on BMI 18.5-24.0
results.macrosDesc: Daily nutrient needs based on your goal ({{goal}})
results.proteinNote: Protein: {{amount}}g per kg bodyweight, helps muscle growth and repair
results.fatNote: Fat: ~27% of total calories, for hormone balance and cell function

oneRepMax.title: 1RM Calculator
oneRepMax.subtitle: Enter weight and reps to estimate your One Rep Max (1RM) and view intensity zones.
oneRepMax.formulaDesc: Epley is good for general use; Brzycki is often more accurate for lower reps (1-10).
oneRepMax.emptyState: Enter weight and reps to view the table

tipsContent.progressiveOverloadPPL: When you can complete max reps ({{max}}) for all sets, increase weight by {{increment}} next week and reset to min reps ({{min}}).
tipsContent.restTimeDesc: Compound movements: 2-3 mins. Isolation movements: 60-90 secs.
tipsContent.frequencyPPL: You selected {{freq}} days/week. Ensure adequate rest.
tipsContent.techniqueDesc: Always prioritize good form over heavy weight.
tipsContent.orderDesc: Suggested order: Upper - Lower - Rest - Upper - Lower - Rest - Rest.
tipsContent.pplDesc: {{weeks}} weeks program ‚Ä¢ {{freq}} sessions per week ‚Ä¢ {{sets}} sets √ó {{min}}-{{max}} reps
